title: RP Generator? Is this a scam?
body:
I have seen this in the comments of many youtube videos,
**[LINK REMOVED]**
This looks like a scam but it's always the (or one of) top comment. Is it just Bots that are just posting on each one or what.

replies.body:
> Is this RP generator a scam?

*facepalm*

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=E2Kb2VBP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-15T06:53:49.585+0000)
> *facepalm*

Heyyy, let's make a website that gives FREE rp.

That are SO many reasons to prove it is a scam.
Nah man, it works. I got my Spirit Guard Udyr from them! Free 4800RP! Just give them your account and they'll do it in less than an hour.

i use dis tool got all legendry skinz and i get chalengr 1 rank cauz skinz = free winz u shud defs gets bro, to get free win u need at least 8 1820 rp skinz cauz the enemy dies from ru swag nd they git 1 shot.

By posting this to the public, where riot can easily see it, you pretty much say i want to illegally get rp. Also if see you cant even reply to the people that post that on youtube, it's obviously a scam.
